data.description: Uses block ciphers to produce MACs
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I just found out that Double CBC-MAC (DMAC) is now officially known
    as Encrypted CBC-MAC (EMAC). I have just recently registered
    Digest::DMAC. Now, I want it to be known as Digest::EMAC, to be
    consistent with its official name.
